仧字的基本解释

仧
cháng
古同“长”。

仧
zhǎng
古同“长”。

仧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cháng］
［《廣韻》直良切，平陽，澄。］
“仧1”的今字。亦作“兏1”。“长1”的繁体字。“镸1”的今字。
(1)指在空间的两端之间距离大。㈠同“短”相对。《诗·齐风·猗嗟》：“猗嗟昌兮，頎而長兮。”汉张衡《西京赋》：“流長則難竭，柢深則難朽。”宋姜夔《续书谱·用墨》：“筆欲鋒長勁而圓。長則含墨，可以運動，勁則有力，圓則妍美。”亦指长度。《论语·乡党》：“必有寢衣，長一身有半。”《史记·天官书》：“彗星，長二丈，類彗。”汉荀悦《汉纪·成帝纪三》：“二月癸未夜，星隕如雨，長二丈。”《西游记》第三回：“那時此寳有二丈多長，斗來粗細。”㈡高。《墨子·公输》：“荆有長松文梓，楩柟豫章，宋無長木，此猶錦繡之與短褐也。”《荀子·非相》：“仲尼長，子弓短。”明高启《入郭过南湖望报恩浮屠》诗：“漁人爲指江城近，一塔船頭看漸長。”亦指高度。《庄子·盗跖》：“﹝跖﹞身長八尺二寸，面目有光，脣如激丹。”汉司马相如《上林赋》：“欃檀木蘭，豫章女貞，長千仞，大連抱。”南朝宋谢惠连《祭古冢文》：“刻木爲人，長三尺。”《西游记》第五回：“吃了幾個桃子，變做二寸長的個人兒，在那大樹梢頭濃

仧字的康熙字典解释

【備考】【子集】【人字部】　仧； 康熙笔画：5； 页码：页94第05
【字彙補】與長同。

仧字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
仧字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cháng］
["Guangyun" Zhiliang cut, Pingyang, Cheng. ]
The present character of "仧1". Also known as "兏1". Traditional characters of "长1". The present character of "镸1".
(1) Refers to the large distance between the two ends of the space. (I) Contrast with "short". "Poetry·Qifeng·Yibo": "Yibo is prosperous and prosperous, but prosperous and long." Han Zhang Heng, "Xijing Fu": "It is hard to be exhausted if it has a long history, and it is hard to perish if it is deep." Song Jiangkui "Continued Book" "Use ink": "The pen wants to be sharp and round. Longer contains ink and can be moved. Strong is powerful, and round is beautiful." It also refers to length. "The Analects of Confucius Xiangdang": "There must be a bedclothes, half of a long body." "Historical Records of Heavenly Official Book": "Comet, two feet long, like a comet." Han Xunyue "Han Ji · Cheng Di Ji San": " On the night of Guiwei in February, the stars fell like rain and were two feet long.” The third chapter of "Journey to the West": "At that time, this treasure was more than two feet long, the thickness of the battle." (ii) High. "Mozi·Gongyu": "Jing Youchang Song Wenzi, Li Nan Yuzhang, Song Wuchangmu, this is beautiful and short brown." "Xunzi · Feixiang": "Zhongni is long, Zi bow is short. "Ming Gaoqi's poem "Entry Guo Guo, Cross Nanhu Lake and Repay the Graceful Buddha": "The fisherman means that the river is near, and the bow of a tower is getting longer." It also means height. "Zhuangzi · Pirate": "﹝跖﹞ is eight feet and two inches long, with a radiant face, and lips like a pill." Han Sima Xiangru's "Shanglin Fu": "Zan Mulan, Yuzhang Privet, Qianren long , Dalian hug." Southern Song Xie Huilian "Sacrifice to the Ancient Tomb": "Carved wood for people, three feet long." The fifth episode of "Journey to the West": "After eating a few peaches, I became a two-inch long individual. Thick at the top of the big tree
